      • readDataNotificationData

        public boolean readDataNotificationData(List<ARSALBLEManager.ARSALManagerNotificationData> notificationsArray,
                               int maxCount,
                               String readCharacteristicKey,
                               long timeout)
        Read notification data. Block until data is received or timeout occurs.
        Parameters:
        notificationsArray - a list where the received data will be put.
        maxCount - maximum number of notifications to receive.
        readCharacteristicKey - the characteristic to read notifications from.
        timeout - the maximum time in milliseconds to wait for data before failing. 0 means infinite timeout.

      • readDataNotificationData

        public boolean readDataNotificationData(List<ARSALBLEManager.ARSALManagerNotificationData> notificationsArray,
                               int maxCount,
                               String readCharacteristicKey)
